title: Mental Health Check-In
description: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?

questions.text: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
Feeling tired or having little energy
Feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way

criticalResponse.message: If you're having thoughts of self-harm, please reach out to a mental health professional or call a crisis hotline immediately. You're not alone.
resources: Crisis Text Line: Text HOME to 741741

suggestions.minimal: Your score suggests you're doing well. Maintain healthy habits and check in periodically.
suggestions.mild: Consider practicing self-care and monitoring your mood. Reach out if symptoms persist.
suggestions.moderate: This suggests significant symptoms. Consider speaking with a healthcare provider.
suggestions.moderatelySevere: These symptoms are substantial. Professional help is recommended.
suggestions.severe: Please seek professional help. These symptoms are significantly impacting your wellbeing.

resources: Mental health apps: Headspace, Calm, Woebot
Workbook: "The Cognitive Behavioral Workbook for Depression"
